CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(OR( ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c ,"10k_local"), ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c ,"10k_non_local"))), Flag_50K__c = true), "50K YTD", IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c ,"10k_local"), ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c ,"10k_non_local")), Flag_50K__c = TRUE ), "50K", IF( IsLifestyle__c = TRUE, "10k lifestyle", IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c ,"10k_local"), ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c ,"10k_non_local")) , Flag_10K_YTM__c = TRUE ), "10K this year", IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Segmentation__c , "10k_local") , ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c ,"10k_non_local") ) , AND(Flag_50K__c = FALSE,Flag_10K_YTM__c = FALSE) ) , "10K", IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c ,"potential_10k_local"), ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c ,"potential_10k_non_local")) , OR(Flag_50K__c = FALSE,Flag_10K_YTM__c = FALSE) ), "Potential 10K", IF( ISPICKVAL(Typology__pc , "Prospects"), "Prospects", IF( ISPICKVAL( Segmentation__c ,"No segmentation"), "No segmentation", "" ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Segmentation To Display
